CustomField.formula: CASE(1, IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Animal Related"), 1, 0), "Animal Related", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Arts"), 1, 0), "Arts", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "BCorp"), 1, 0), "BCorp", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Culture"), 1, 0), "Culture", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Economic Development"), 1, 0), "Economic Development", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Education K-12"), 1, 0), "Education K-12", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Environment"), 1, 0), "Environment", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Healthcare"), 1, 0), "Healthcare", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Humanities"), 1, 0), "Humanities", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Human Services"), 1, 0), "Human Services", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "International Development"), 1, 0), "International Development", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Public/Social Benefit"), 1, 0), "Public/Social Benefit", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Religious"), 1, 0), "Religious", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Research"), 1, 0), "Research", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Social Justice"), 1, 0), "Social Justice", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Technology"), 1, 0), "Technology", IF(ISPICKVAL(Volunteer_Organization__r.Organization_Cause__c , "Youth"), 1, 0), "Youth", "")
CustomField.label: Organization Cause
